{{refimprove|date=June 2015}} {{Infobox album | Name = Volumen | Type = video | Artist = [[Björk]] | Cover = Volumen DVD.jpg | Cover size = | Released = 30 November 1998 (VHS)
31 May 1999 (DVD)
2 December 2002 (''Greatest Hits'' edition) | Recorded = | Genre = {{flatlist| * [[Alternative dance]] * [[electronica]] }} | Length = 62:14
92:24 (reissue) | Label = [[One Little Indian]] | Director = {{flatlist| * [[Michel Gondry]] * [[Sophie Muller]] * [[Danny Cannon]] * [[Stéphane Sednaoui]] * [[Jean-Baptiste Mondino]] * [[Spike Jonze]] * [[John Kricfalusi]] * [[Paul White (director)|Paul White]] * [[Alexander McQueen]] * [[Chris Cunningham]] * [[M/M Paris]] * [[Inez van Lamsweerde and Vinoodh Matadin|Inez and Vinoodh]] * [[Eiko Ishioka]] * Lynn Fox }} | Producer = | Chronology = | Last album = ''[[Live at Shepherds Bush Empire (Björk DVD)|Live at Shepherds Bush Empire]]''
(1998) | This album = '''''Volumen'''''
(1998) | Next album = ''[[Live in Cambridge]]''
(2001) | Misc = {{Extra chronology | Type = video | Last album = ''[[Volumen Plus]]''
(2002) | This album = '''''Greatest Hits - Volumen 1993–2003'''''
(2002) | Next album = ''[[Inside Björk]]''
(2003) }} }} '''''Volumen''''' is a music video collection released by Icelandic musician [[Björk]] on 30 November 1998 as a [[VHS]] and on 31 May 1999 as a [[DVD]].{{cite web|title=Volumen - the video collection |url=http://www.bjork.com/websense/grapefly/volumen_video/volumen_1.htm |publisher=bjork.com |date= |accessdate=30 April 2016 |deadurl=unfit |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20000819045945/http://www.bjork.com/websense/grapefly/volumen_video/volumen_1.htm |archivedate=August 19, 2000 }}{{cite web|title=Björk - Volumen - DVD |url=http://www.indian.co.uk/cgi-bin/oli/title.pl?item_no=3818 |publisher=One Little Indian |date= |accessdate=30 April 2016 |deadurl=unfit |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20001204230200/http://www.indian.co.uk/cgi-bin/oli/title.pl?item_no=3818 |archivedate=December 4, 2000 }} It includes all of Björk's videos until "[[Hunter (Björk song)|Hunter]]". On 2 December 2002, it was reissued as ''Greatest Hits - Volumen 1993–2003'' which includes all the videos to "Nature Is Ancient". A separate DVD released in 2002, ''[[Volumen Plus]]'', is available for those who purchased this original release and who want the additional seven videos. It has been certified Gold in the USA.[http://www.riaa.com/goldandplatinumdata.php?table=SEARCH_RESULTS] ==Track listing== {{Track listing | extra_column = Director(s) | title1 = [[Human Behaviour]] | extra1 = [[Michel Gondry]] | length1 = 4:25 | title2 = [[Venus as a Boy]] | extra2 = [[Sophie Muller]] | length2 = 5:54 | title3 = [[Play Dead (song)|Play Dead]] | extra3 = [[Danny Cannon]] | length3 = 3:59 | title4 = [[Big Time Sensuality]] | extra4 = [[Stéphane Sednaoui]] | length4 = 5:03 | title5 = [[Violently Happy]] | extra5 = [[Jean-Baptiste Mondino]] | length5 = 3:28 | title6 = [[Army of Me (Björk song)|Army of Me]] | extra6 = Gondry | length6 = 4:35 | title7 = [[Isobel (song)|Isobel]] | extra7 = Gondry | length7 = 4:24 | title8 = [[It's Oh So Quiet]] | extra8 = [[Spike Jonze]] | length8 = 4:08 | title9 = [[Hyperballad]] | extra9 = Gondry | length9 = 4:09 | title10 = [[Possibly Maybe]] | extra10 = Sednaoui | length10 = 5:22 | title11 = [[I Miss You (Björk song)|I Miss You]] | extra11 = [[John Kricfalusi]] | length11 = 4:11 | title12 = [[Jóga]] | extra12 = Gondry | length12 = 3:22 | title13 = [[Bachelorette (song)|Bachelorette]] | extra13 = Gondry | length13 = 5:26 | title14 = [[Hunter (Björk song)|Hunter]] | extra14 = [[Paul White (director)|Paul White]] | length14 = 3:48 }} {{Track listing | headline = Japan edition bonus disc | collapsed = yes | extra_column = Director(s) | title1 = [[All Is Full of Love]] | extra1 = [[Chris Cunningham]] | length1 = 4:50 | title2 = [[Alarm Call]] | extra2 = [[Alexander McQueen]] | length2 = 3:52 }} {{Track listing | extra_column = Director(s) | headline = '' Greatest Hits - Volumen 1993–2003'' | title15 = [[Alarm Call]] | extra15 = [[Alexander McQueen]] | length15 = 3:52 | title16 = [[All Is Full of Love]] | extra16 = [[Chris Cunningham]] | length16 = 4:18 | title17 = [[Hidden Place]] | extra17 = {{flatlist| * [[M/M Paris]] * [[Inez van Lamsweerde and Vinoodh Matadin|Inez and Vinoodh]] }} | length17 = 4:32 | title18 = [[Pagan Poetry]] | extra18 = [[Nick Knight]] | length18 = 4:11 | title19 = [[Cocoon (Björk song)|Cocoon]] | extra19 = [[Eiko Ishioka]] | length19 = 4:34 | title20 = [[It's in Our Hands]] | extra20 = Jonze | length20 = 4:22 | title21 = Nature Is Ancient | extra21 = Lynn Fox | length21 = 4:21 }} ==References== {{Bjork}} [[Category:Björk video albums]]
